oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nuclear parity-violating effects - anapole moment
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KULKARNI, S
WARKE, CS
GAMBHIR, YK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: cesium
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We present here the relativistic formulation for the calculation of the nuclear anapole moment in the relativistic mean field (RMF) approach. The RMF results are presented for relevant nuclei. We also report the result of our preliminary calculations for the nuclear anapole moment for Cs-133 Obtained with different sets of weak meson-nucleon coupling constants.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: International Symposium on Spin-Isospin Responses and Weak Processes in Hadrons and Nuclei,OSAKA, JAPAN,MAR 08-10, 1994
